TopicTitle: Game crash all of a sudden

Articles.Content:
I run the steam version of KSP 1.12.1 in Windows 10.

I was trying to plan an encounter with tylo. But the game suddenly crashed. I have no idea what happend. Can someone help please. (Btw this happend twice in a row.)

I have a Dell Latitude E6520 Series Laptop.(I don't know the system specifications)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/13prY-5DxFgCyuc7Q3kvIORty73t8BzbK/view?usp=sharing (KSP log file)

Edited July 2, 2021 by dorsanegg

Repeating crash on planning Tylo encounter huh

Gdrive requires me to login, so I'll skip that part for now, but I assume you have a lot of "CheckEncounter: failed to find any intercepts at all" or "[Orbit] SolveClosestApproach: solve took too many iterations, result incorrect" at the end of the log. Bug already reported   https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/28107

Current workaround is to reduce the patched conic limit to 3 or 2. Won't help you with making an encounter though, unfortunately. Or plan it much later, like after reaching Jool SOI, but then that's very inefficient.

Edited July 2, 2021 by The Aziz
